title: Chests
body: I Just want to know can I still earn chest as I play alone or do I have to be premade in order to get chests? The reason I am asking is that I played a normal game with {{champion:11}} and 2 from my teammates (non friends) got an S, I got an A and I had no chest (and I didn't earn a chest with {{champion:11}}  before). Or do I have to get an S too?

replies.body:
i have crafted 6 hexakeys 
and i am unable to open  any chests when i have earned multiple s with champions nd 6 keys ca you help?

You'll only get a chest if **you** or **someone in your premade group** earns an S-, S or S+ rating for the match. Additionally, you can only earn one chest per champion per season, so if you'll want to ensure you're earning S ratings with a variety of champs to earn the most chests!

Check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for complete details. Let me know if you have any questions.

Hello, there are several possible reasons you don't get Hextech chests, please have a look at the FAQ:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide
Click on the blue button "hextech chest".
